data.name: Jetpack Vacation Demo
data.detailed_description:
https://store.steampowered.com/widget/1293930/

PICK UP AND PLAY!

Jetpack Vacation is a whole new way to holiday! Equipped with handheld jetpacks, you can fly, dive and shoot your way through a collection of fun jetpack-based mini-games. Prepare for takeoff!

JETPACK FLYING

Experience jetpack flying physics on a tropical island paradise!

JETPACK SPORTS ARENA

Play jetpack sports with other players around the world!

TARGET PRACTICE PAINTBALL

Play mini-games such as target practice paintball to achieve the highest scores!
